meanings.definition: A specialist in the study of diseases of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neuropathologists carefully examine the brain and spinal cord for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The neuropathologists at the hospital work tirelessly to understand and treat neurological conditions.
meanings.sent3: The neuropathologists had a brain-teasing puzzle to solve in the case of the mysterious illness.
meanings.sent4: In the medical field, neuropathologists are like detectives, uncovering clues hidden within the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The neuropathologists' dedication to unraveling the complexities of the nervous system is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Someone who diagnoses and treats diseases of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neuropathologists use advanced technology to accurately diagnose neurological disorders.
meanings.sent2: The neuropathologists' expertise is crucial in providing effective treatment for nerve-related illnesses.
meanings.sent3: During the medical conference, the neuropathologists shared fascinating case studies of nerve ailments.
meanings.sent4: The role of neuropathologists in healing the nervous system is akin to that of skilled craftsmen repairing delicate machinery.
meanings.sent5: The neuropathologists' compassionate care brings hope to patients battling neurological diseases.
